body:
repeatmasker 4.0.9 made some changes to the interactive configure script,
which required some refactoring in the package recipe.

The generation of spack-config.in was modified to be clearer about how lines were written,
and perl is now pulled from `which` instead of `inspect.getmodule(self)` which seemed to stop working for some reason.

Changes were tested to be backwards compatible with the existing 4.0.7 version.
title: repeatmasker: add 4.0.9
